outputs.output_descr:
The Goal of the project is:"An effective multiple use forest governance system is in operation resulting in enhanced biodiversity and maintained landscape level ecosystem functions, integrity and resilience for the Caspian Hyrcanian forests of Iran."
This would be addressed by achieving following objective: "To put in place a collaborative governance system and know-how for managing a mosaic of land uses in the Caspian Hyrcanian forest that provides habitat integrity and helps maintain landscape level ecosystem functions and resilience".

project_descr: Building a Multiple-Use Forest Management Framework to Conserve Biodiversity in the Caspian Hyrcanian Forest Landscape
